sentences: Ta lõpetas keskkooli ja läks seejärel tööle.
Algul tõusis püsti üks, seejärel kohe teine külaline.
Kõigepealt süütas ta tule, seejärel tõmbas kardinad ette.
context: Seejärel is an Estonian adverb meaning 'after that' or 'then'. It is used to indicate sequence or what follows a previous event. The word can be broken down as 'see' (this/that) + 'järel' (behind/after), literally translating to 'after this/that'. In sentences, it typically appears after the first action mentioned and before describing what happened next.
